Oct. 26, 1907 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Souvenir de Wagner
Ballarat, Victoria, Australia National championship run as part of the Royal Run as part of South Street Eisteddfod.
Besses O' Barn on their first Australian tour attended the contest & under the special arrangement with the South Street organizing committee , during a break performed several courtesy numbers for the public
Street March: 1 Port Pirie
